unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a Desi Boost - Finally!**
normalised: E V Charging Gets a Desi Boost - Finally!

unnormalised: Alright folks, seems like the EV charging scene in India is finally getting some juice! Remember how you'd be sweating bullets trying to find a charger on that road trip to Mysore? Well, things are (hopefully) improving.
normalised: Alright folks, seems like the E V charging scene in India is finally getting some juice! Remember how you would be sweating bullets trying to find a charger on that road trip to Mysore? Well, things are (hopefully) improving.

unnormalised: Tata Power just announced a massive expansion of their charging network, focusing on connecting major highways. Apparently, they're aiming for a charger every 100 km or so, which is awesome!
normalised: Tata Power just announced a massive expansion of their charging network, focusing on connecting major highways. Apparently, they are aiming for a charger every one hundred kilometer or so, which is awesome!

unnormalised: And get this – IIT Madras is working on some super-fast charging tech, claiming they can practically fill up your EV faster than you can say "Biryani!". Seriously, though, imagine zipping through Bangalore traffic and then topping up your EV while grabbing a plate of piping hot biryani.
normalised: And get this – I I T Madras is working on some super-fast charging tech, claiming they can practically fill up your E V faster than you can say "Biryani!". Seriously, though, imagine zipping through Bangalore traffic and then topping up your E V while grabbing a plate of piping hot biryani.

unnormalised: Even local kirana stores are getting in on the act, offering charging points through partnerships. So, next time you're buying Onam essentials, you might be able to plug in your EV too!
normalised: Even local kirana stores are getting in on the act, offering charging points through partnerships. So, next time you are buying Onam essentials, you might be able to plug in your E V too!

unnormalised: Reliance BP also said they're pumping in Rs. 5,000 crores into charging infrastructure. Hopefully, this means no more range anxiety and more road trips.
normalised: Reliance B P also said they are pumping in rupee five thousand crore into charging infrastructure. Hopefully, this means no more range anxiety and more road trips.

unnormalised: Fingers crossed these plans actually translate to more chargers on the ground!
normalised: Fingers crossed these plans actually translate to more chargers on the ground!

unnormalised: Lets hope so, for the good of EV adoption in India.
normalised: Lets hope so, for the good of E V adoption in India.
